results.title: The Game
results.creator_credit: Michael Jenkins, ABC-TV (Australia) and Michael Carson
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Scales of Justice Series”.
The Game is a story of jealousy and conflict, personal and professional. Detective Sergeant Draffin and Miles are both from the same mould. Both are ruthlessly ambitious, both boast a reputation of being first class operators, and both are very confident of their ability. However, neither is used to sharing the limelight, and when Draffin is transferred to the Drug Squad, Miles’ home territory, the scene is set for a major confrontation. Rated: M

results.title: The Job
results.creator_credit: Michael Carson, ABC-TV (Australia) and Michael Jenkins
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Scales of Justice Series”.
The Job is a story of naivety. Probationary Constable Leonard Webber has the makings of a good policeman, but his ideals bring him into conflict with his colleagues. His lack of experience makes him vulnerable and his training has not prepared him for the system, how it works and the rationalisation of the double dealings. Rated: M

results.title: The Numbers
results.creator_credit: Michael Jenkins, ABC-TV (Australia) and Michael Carson
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Scales of Justice Series”.
The Numbers is a story of ambitious and cunning manipulation. Glen Ferris is an astute young politician. At 41 he is already Attorney General, but his revolutionary reforms have weakened his standing in the Senior Cabinet. He needs the numbers, so he decides to use his controversial bill to take on vice-king Artie Roach, a move which makes him a crusader in the public eye while causing discussion in his own parliamentary wing. Rated: M

results.title: Prospecting
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Salesmanship”.
Explains that the foundations of successful selling is a systematic method of locating prospective customers. The methods of three successful salesmen are illustrated; one keeps his eyes and ears open through personal observation, one uses an initial sale to get a prospect for the next, and the third uses friends to give him additional contacts.

results.title: Making that sale
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Salesmanship Series”.
Demonstrates an effective method of closing a sale. To do this a salesman must demonstrate the product, overcome any objections, restate the points which have the customer’s agreement and finally persuade the prospect to sign a contract, emphasising the advantages of immediate action. Animated series.

results.title: Pre-Approach
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Salesmanship”.
The methods employed by a salesman of industrial lubricants in making a very difficult sale is illustrated. The film emphasizes the need to acquire the pertinent information about a perspective client before the sales interview and adjusting the sales plan to suit the ideas and personality of the customer.

results.title: Salesmanship
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Approach
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Salesmanship”.
A training film which stresses the importance of a well planned sales interview. Some of the factors that contribute to a good approach in selling are discussed. Stresses that a sales person must gain the interest, confidence, favourable attention, and positive interest of the prospective customer during the interview.

results.title: Lifting and Carrying
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Safetycare”.
The correct techniques and an understanding of the principles of safe lifting is essential knowledge. This video examines the correct procedures for different types of objects and underlines the principles of safe lifting techniques.
